content: First Half_1, Nashville, Mukhtar, 4 (penalty kick), 45th+2 minute.

Second Half_2, Nashville, Mukhtar, 5 (penalty kick), 70th; 3, Nashville, Mukhtar, 6, 90th+1.Goalies_Chicago, Christopher Brady, Spencer Richey; Nashville, Joe Willis, Elliot Panicco.Yellow Cards_Lovitz, Nashville, 29th; Koutsias, Chicago, 36th; Omsberg, Chicago, 53rd; Bunbury, Nashville, 56th; Burks, Chicago, 67th; Moore, Nashville, 77th; Aceves, Chicago, 88th.Referee_Mark Allatin.
